dcterms:description: The Geographic Atrophy (GA) dataset consists of OCT volumetric scans from patients with geographic atrophy, used to assess the effect of pegcetacoplan treatment on photoreceptor maintenance.
dcterms:title: Geographic Atrophy (GA) Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Li
Y. Chen
Z. Ji
K. Xie
S. Yuan
Q. Chen
S. Li
dcterms:description: The Retinal Blood Vessel (RBV) dataset includes OCT volumes and SLO images annotated for retinal blood vessel segmentation, used to evaluate the performance of segmentation methods.
dcterms:title: Retinal Blood Vessel (RBV) Dataset

dcterms:description: An in-house dataset for GA segmentation consisting of OCT volumetric scans and corresponding annotations, used for training and validating segmentation models.
dcterms:title: In-house Dataset for GA Segmentation

dcterms:description: An in-house dataset for RBV segmentation containing OCT volumes and SLO images with annotations for retinal blood vessels, used for training and validating segmentation models.
dcterms:title: In-house Dataset for RBV Segmentation
